R1.name: Use
R1.description: The licensor grants the licensee a right to 'use'.

R2.name: Reproduce
R2.description: The licensor grants the licensee a right to 'reproduce'.

R3.name: Modify/Create derivative works
R3.description: The licensor grants the licensee a right to 'modify'.

R4.name: Distribution
R4.description: The licensor grants the licensee a right to 'distribute'.

R5.name: Sublicense
R5.description: The licensor grants the licensee a right to 'sublicense'.

R6.name: PatentLicense
R6.description: The licensor grants the licensee - as the case may be - a patent license.

R7.name: Trademarks
R7.description: The licensee may not use the trademark/name of the licensor.

R8.name: CommercialUtilization
R8.description: You may use the licensed Software for commercial purposes.

R9.name: CommercialUse:LicenseFee
R9.description: You may charge a license fee for the licensed Software.

O1.name: RetainCopyRightNotice
O1.description: You must ensure, the Copyright Notice will be retained.

O2.name: RetainListOfConditions
O2.description: You must retain the list of conditions (license) unchanged.

O3.name: RetainWarrantyDisclaimer
O3.description: Please ensure that you retained the Warranty Disclaimer!

O4.name: ProvideCopyOfLicenseText
O4.description: You are obliged to provide a copy of the license text.

O5.name: ReproduceCopyrightNotice
O5.description: Ensure that the Copyright notice will be reproced.

O6.name: ReproduceListOfConditions
O6.description: Ensure the license will be reproduced.

O7.name: ReproduceWarrantyDisclaimer
O7.description: Ensure the Warranty Disclaimer will be reproduced.

O8.name: ProvideSourceCode
O8.description: You must provide access to the source code.

O9.name: ProvideSourceCode (SaaS)
O9.description: This license requires you to provide your source code even when operated as SaaS.

O10.name: Provide Written Offer
O10.description: You must accompany any distribution with the written offer to supply the source code free of charge.

O11.name: Attribute Authors
O11.description: This license requires you under these circumstances to attribute the authors.

O20.name: Copyleft
O20.description: This license infects linked sources, so that all directly linked code must be released under this license.

O21.name: IndicateChanges
O21.description: The license requires you to indicate that you changed the original code.

O22.name: TechnicalRestriction
O22.description: You are not allowed to prevent the user from executing the rights granted by this license by any means.

O23.name: DescribeChanges
O23.description: The license requires you to describe the changes you have made.

O24.name: ProvideChanges
O24.description: The license requires you to publish the sources of the changes you made.
